content: the little teddy bear is knitted flat in row from the top down in one piece from head to legs the hands nose and ears are worked separately and sewn on finishing includes seaming all parts with mattress stitch or whipstitch where specified ⸻ skill level confident beginner you should be comfortable with knitting flat back and forth in row basic increases and decreases mattress stitch for seaming whipstitch for smooth joins ⸻ size the finished size may vary depending on your yarn and needle choice for example drops soft tweed 50g/130m on 3 5 mm needles → approx 17 cm tall materials 30 g of drops soft tweed or similar yarn small amount of black yarn/thread for eyes and nose needles straight needles 3 5 mm long enough to hold all stitches comfortably or circular needles 3 5 mm with a long cable for flat knitting or choose needles 1 1 5 sizes smaller than recommended for your yarn prefer knitting in the round with no seams take a look at the in-the-round version of this pattern here https //youtu be/f-81u75-o9c want the written pattern you can find the full written version here flat https //maylilyknitting com/little-teddy-bear-knitting-pattern/ round https //maylilyknitting com/little-teddy-bear-toy-knitting-pattern/
